name: Fate Chapter 1 (the introduction)
description:
Fate is a difficult game patience, thinking and running are important things. Fate is based on a story that is resolved at the end of the last chapter. Story: one evening you wake up not knowing what's going on you've heard something. That fate is waiting for you in chapter 1. chapter 1 is the beginning of everything "a little introduction".  But this doesn't make your destiny wait this doesn't mean that everything is safe in the opposite any moment you can die so save is very useful this is explained in the game where. Come on start in the game the story and hell will begin.

!!!WARNING this game is not for epeleptics!!!

Graphics card : at least Radeon RX 460 Processor : at least ryzen 5 or intel i5 RAM : at least 8 GB ddr4

playing time 20 minutes up to 1 hour

CHAPTER 1 and CHAPTER 2 are different Storys

Chapter 2 available on STEAM
